data.quote: Eating by myself in my own apartment, single and alone again for the first time in many years, I should have felt, but did not feel, sad. data.quote: I've got to be high class... Which is sad, because I like bars.

data.quote: I'm a sucker for sad disco pop.

data.quote: I'm not bothered or sad about being on my own - after all, I've never had a husband.

data.quote: Nobody wants to hear R&B. It's sad. If you want to be on the radio you got to stay young.

data.quote: So many schools are getting rid of music programs and it's really sad because I know that when I started singing and stuff it was something that I always wanted to do and I never believed in myself to be able to do it.

data.quote: I've never had my heart broken. It's a very sad state of affairs. I think everybody should have their heart broken. I don't think it says anything good about me at all.

data.quote: Dwight is a sad clown. You've seen those paintings of sad clown.
